action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image contains 7 Tetris blocks. There are 3 red blocks, 2 yellow blocks, 1 orange block, and 1 purple block. The red blocks are in the shape of an L, a T, and a backwards L. The yellow blocks are in the shape of a plus sign and a backwards L. The orange block is in the shape of a T. The purple block is in the shape of a backwards L.

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image contains 7 Tetris blocks. There is a blue "L" shape in the top right corner. There are two blue "T" shapes, one on the left and one in the middle. There is a green "L" shape to the right of the middle blue "T" shape. There are two grey "T" shapes, one below the green "L" shape and one below the two blue "T" shapes. There is a cyan "T" shape in the bottom left corner.

This is my DESCRIPTION: The image contains 7 Tetris blocks. There are 3 red blocks, 2 yellow blocks, 1 orange block, and 1 purple block. The red blocks are in the shape of an L, a T, and a backwards L. The yellow blocks are in the shape of a plus sign and a backwards L. The orange block is in the shape of a T. The purple block is in the shape of a backwards L.

QUESTION: Are any of the blocks in your image the same color as any of the blocks in my image?

There is a green "L" shape to the right of the middle blue "T" shape. There are two grey "T" shapes, one below the green "L" shape and one below the two blue "T" shapes. There is a cyan "T" shape in the bottom left corner.

QUESTION: Are any of the blocks in your image the same shape as any of the blocks in my image?

ANSWER: No.

Now come to a decision. What do you think: are your picture and the other picture described the same picture?  Write "DECISION: same image" if you think they are the same picture or "DECISION: different images" if you think they are different pictures. Do not add anything else.
